title: Oops
description: I’ve had a crush on Lawson O’Connor since forever but it can never be, he’s my older brother’s best friend.I always thought the feelings were one-sided but recently, I’m beginning to suspect otherwise. A subtle touch here. An inappropriate comment there.A smoldering look.A sexy wink.And then it happens, we hook up. It’s everything I ever imagined and more but we can never be, can we?
author: D.L. Gallie
